comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content:
Entering the Karimjee Hall, Dar es Salaam, 27 March 1961, at the start of the Constitutional Conference. The Governor, Sir Richard Turnbull, KCMG, leads the British Secretary of State for the Colonies, the Rt. Hon. Iain Macleod, MP, followed by the President of TANU, Mr Julius K Nyerere, and then the Governor's Private Secretary, Mr I H Norton.  
,
